name: Solo Knight
description:
SOLO KNIGHT

2D pixel art fantasy action adventure game.  Destroy your enemies, use weapon skills and spells from the shop to defeat the enemies and retake your castle.

FEATURES 

  • Basic Sword, Sword combo in Air and Ground
  • Bow and Arrow weapon
  • Cast spells of different powers
  • Double Jump ability
  • Wall Climb ability

CONTROLS

  • Use A / D to MOVE
  • Use LEFT MOUSE /  LEFT CTRL to ATTACK
  • Use SPACE for JUMP
  • Use TAB for SHOP
  • Use ESC / P for PAUSE MENU
  • Use MOUSE SCROLL / NUM PAD for WEAPON SELECTION

Contact me at - crew7studiogames@gmail.com
